plot: A rooster detective and a dame in despair try to solve the case of the missing egg. When the tracks lead toward the farmhouse, our heroes set out on an easter morning mission to save their egg from the farmer's breakfast and boiling water!
title: Hard Boiled Chicken
plot_es: A rooster detective and a dame in despair try to solve the case of the missing egg. When the tracks lead toward the farmhouse, our heroes set out on an easter morning mission to save their egg from the farmer's breakfast and boiling water!
plot_en: A rooster detective and a dame in despair try to solve the case of the missing egg. When the tracks lead toward the farmhouse, our heroes set out on an easter morning mission to save their egg from the farmer's breakfast and boiling water!
